base_description: White ceramic toilet with tank and bowl.
part_description: Comprises a tank, bowl, and seat; tank is rectangular, bowl is oval, seat is circular, all aligned vertically.
internal_interaction_description: Water flows from the tank into the bowl when flushed, facilitated by internal plumbing. The seat covers the bowl, providing a surface for sitting. The flush mechanism in the tank activates the release of water into the bowl, ensuring waste removal.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with plumbing systems for water supply and waste removal. Used by people for sanitation purposes, requiring external flushing to operate. Positioned on the floor, it connects to a sewer or septic system, ensuring hygienic waste disposal.
